alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 215 PM MDT... At 140 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grantsville. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 75 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
